name: Time Stop Island - Walking Sim
description:
! ! ! ! ! ! !

You have come to this island. Time seems to stand still for everyone and everything except you. The people on the island are dying tragically. What killed them?

Everything is too quiet and spooky, and you walk the island alone, hoping to find some secret at the highest point of the island.

You can go around as much as you like, but I suggest you follow the red light from sky and explore all 7 locations to get the full experience! Some of the locations will be harder to jump on, so be careful!

Player Controls.

W A S D and Space for basic moving

Shift+W for runing

Caution.

Running and jumping will get you up to many places.

Light will tell you where people are in distress.

If you fall into certain places and cannot escape, restart the game.

The game's soundtrack is from the game The Forest. Music by Gabe Castro. This is a walking sim by Shuyuan Ji (SKu11zZ). Thanks For Playing. This game is for educational purpose.
